title: Bard, the Wandering Caretaker, available now

replies.body: Found a bug that crashes the game. If {{champion:432}} and {{champion:161}} use both ults at the same time, everyone crashes. Happened to me three times in one game.
Well I guess you can say he's a BARD-ASS!!
Here come the trolls :/

yea lol his ult is like {{champion:48}} 
TROLL KING!!!!!
how is {{champion:48}} a troll king?

Trundle is the king of the Frejlord trolls...
Read the lore.
I really want {{champion:432}} so jelly :(...BUT SOON he is gonna get nerfed JUST SOON!!
Mmmmhmmmm I mean he has 1 damaging spell so probs maybe a buff insted... ALL ABOARD THE {{champion:432}} HYPE TRAIN

{{champion:432}} Really dissapointed with his damage only one spell actually damages an opponent, need to make caretakers shrine like nami's ebb and flo.
then he will be more usefull. pretty please
{{champion:432}} is a TROLL

his ultimate is a TROLL
when i tryed to run away with Fizz.he done his ultimate
{{summoner:30}} of troll ults:{{champion:429}}
{{champion:429}} troll ult
no the troll king is kalista's ult
The Robots have taken me. Please send help.
{{champion:432}} is so squishy

What would happen if for example a champion had walked over a teemo shroom and is getting poisoned and then if you use {{champion:432}} ult, would the poison run off or would it still be there during/after {{champion:432}} ult?

Bard will get nerfed next patch
{{champion:432}}
I really want to play as {{champion:432}} . I've always wanted a champion that can go through walls

honestly no need for nerf. he is useless against aggressive supports. i have already played against him with leona a couple of times and he is useless. his utility is good for helping teams engage through walls but otherwise he gets rekt easy against aggresors
Pls answer. Who is the best support {{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:412}}  or {{champion:37}}
